Title: Building a serverless API that tweets about my blog posts using Azure OpenAI and LangChain
Description: This post is going to show you a simple way of building a serverless Python API that uses LangChain and Azure OpenAI to create tweets summarizing the content of my blog posts.

Title: Should you adopt .NET 7 or wait for .NET 8?
Description: Should you adopt .NET 7 or wait for .NET 8? Let's explore the pros and cons of each alternative.

Title: Programmatically evaluating policies in ASP.NET Core - Code Rethinked
Description: To programmatically evaluate policies, we make use of IAuthorizationService, which when invoked produces whether the user is authorized or not

Title: The Journey with multi-tenancy accesses continues with some issues

Title: Error Messages Are Our Friends
Description: This article is about how to understand and embrace error messages as tools to help us find issues in our code.

Title: Looking at C# 12 Proposals and Beyond
Description: C# has been through a lot of change in the last decade. From open-sourcing the language to a new cross-platform framework to yearly releases instead of 3-year iterations. Meanwhile, new languages, new frameworks, and new paradigms have taken off in the software industry, including the rise in popularity of Node.js, TypeScript, Kotlin, Rust, Go, and Python. Through it all, C# and .NET stayed relevant and popular. In this blog post, weâ€™ll glimpse the day-to-day activity and challenges the C# language design team faces.
